title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CLI and REST API to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; promises & streams for generate/chat/embed.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; chat, model switch, conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker & compose snippets for CPU/GPU (CUDA/ROCm) containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, streaming via HttpClient.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat over PDFs.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot supporting Ollama backends for chat and image-to-text.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Experimental NestJS module wrapping Ollama REST endpoints for server-side apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; async client using reqwest, supports streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app adding Ollama chat & embeddings APIs with admin UI for model management.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for fine-tuned community models.
